sentence: HAPPY BIRTHDAY: Reps. Steve Chabot (R-Ohio) and Rick Crawford (R-Ark.)

sentence: Representative Carolyn Bourdeaux of Georgia, a Democrat, praised the program for giving local mainstays like the Aurora Theater, an arts venue, “the resources they need to get back on their feet.” And Representative Steve Chabot, an Ohio Republican, brought Dr. Rich Coleman, owner of Four Paws Animal Hospital, to a House hearing.
title: Little of the Paycheck Protection Program’s $800 Billion Protected Paychecks

sentence: The Ukrainian people are passionate and willing to fight for their country, but they need more help from the United States by way of tougher sanctions, more lethal weapons, and a halt to the United States' import of oil from Russia, Reps. Steve Chabot and Brian Fitzpatrick said in a joint interview on Newsmax Saturday.
author: Sandy Fitzgerald
title: Reps. Fitzpatrick, Chabot to Newsmax: Ukraine Needs More from United States

sentence: His GOP opponent, Steve Chabot, has spent his entire career voting against the interests of his constituents.
author: Ramsey Touchberry
title: House Democrats unveil districts they hope to flip from red to blue

sentence: Williams in his column points out that Steve Chabot will attack Landsman about his proposal in their campaign this year for the U.S. House seat.
author: Letters to editor
title: Letter: More pressing issues in Delhi than men in skirts
